description:
In test case ExtendedAvailabilityZoneTestV21 we initialize ALL API extension instead of one (extended_availability_zone extension).

here: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/c3f3dc012ae3938b6f116491273a4eef0acfab83/nova/tests/unit/api/openstack/compute/contrib/test_extended_availability_zone.py#L96
title: Incorrect initialisation of tests for extended_availability_zones V21 API extension

comments.content:
In test case ExtendedAvailabilityZoneTestV21 we initialize ALL API extension instead of one (extended_availability_zone extension).

here: https://github.com/openstack/nova/blob/c3f3dc012ae3938b6f116491273a4eef0acfab83/nova/tests/unit/api/openstack/compute/contrib/test_extended_availability_zone.py#L96

commit c9779326dba979715f97ce11c9d1dc6c8694d7e0
Author: Sergey Nikitin <email address hidden>
Date:   Thu Dec 11 13:54:33 2014 +0300

    Fixed incorrect initialization of availability zone tests
    
    We initialize tests for V2.1 API extension
    extended_availability_zone incorrect. In test case
    ExtendedAvailabilityZoneTestV21 we initialize ALL API
    extensions instead of one (extended_availability_zone).
    
    Change-Id: I475c73b2a95e207c18beb398b332baa6c4157e86
    Closes-Bug: #1401486
